name: I Just Want To Help
description:
A serious game about depression in which the user can select different multiple choices that affect the story-line. The overall goal of this choose your own adventure story is to help teach the user about some possibilities to talk to someone who may be going through a low point in their life.

Artist - Olivia Horacek

Storywriter - Zach White

Programmer - Robert Grzechowiak
